attributes.comment:
I am saddened to learn about the proposed fee increase for international
adoptions. We have seen such a increase of fees in the last several year,
increases that cannot be explained. The increases are above and beyond what
would be considered normal increases. As it is many parents of children adopted
before the first recent increase as couple years ago cannot even afford to get their
childs Cerificate of citizenship, now the increase is even higher.
I hope you will consider how these extravagant increases will effect many families
whose dream of having chidlren may be hindered due to the increase in all these
fees.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Patricia M. Gonda
